title: 服务器无法开启
author: 猥琐沈尼玛
txt_content:
[16:43:51] [Server thread/信息] [FML]: Injecting existing block and item data into this server instance
[16:43:51] [Server thread/信息] [FML]: Found a missing id from the world craftguide:craftguide_item
[16:43:51] [Server thread/ERROR] [FML]: There are unidentified mappings in this world - we are going to attempt to process anyway
[16:43:51] [Server thread/ERROR] [FML]: Unidentified item: craftguide:craftguide_item, id 4096
[16:43:51] [Server thread/警告] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader detected missing blocks/items.

There are 1 missing blocks and items in this save.
If you continue the missing blocks/items will get removed.
A world backup will be automatically created in your saves directory.

Missing Blocks/Items:
craftguide:craftguide_item


Run the command /fml confirm or or /fml cancel to proceed.
Alternatively start the server with -Dfml.queryResult=confirm or -Dfml.queryResult=cancel to preselect the answer.

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
你刚刚删了MOD吧？
输入/fml confirm 或者/fml cancel即可（请带/输入）

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
检查到一个 craftguide_item 物品锁住了服务器 

输入 /fml confirm 来确定删除这个物品 才可以启动服务器
